title: Mid game dc, can't reconnect, can't log on
body: Mid way through an aran game and all of a sudden its attempting to reconnect, check my wifi, it is working perfectly but league just won't connect. So I force quit league and try to relaunch it, and then it is stuck at the logging on screen forever? are you kidding me???? anyone know why

replies.body: just happened to me in a ranked match rip one of my placements
Same happened to me just now. Ping spiked to over 5000 I DC and try to login again and now it says I have to redownload the new patch and the queue is full. Wtf is going on??

Getting stuck at reconnect like this or failing to log back in the middle of a match can be pretty frustrating, and I'd like to help,  It sounds like your network is specifically failing to reach the game servers for some reason.  Your best bet would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to restore your connection, and I recommend starting with trying a wired connection.  Let me know if you have any questions.
